title: Officers wounded in ambush while stopping suspect in fatal shooting: Police chief
desc: Police in Gainesville, Florida say two officers were ambushed while responding to a fatal shooting

title: Brazilian au pair testifies against former employer and lover in double homicide case
desc: A Brazilian au pair is testifying against her former employer and lover in a double homicide case that she says was part of an elaborate scheme to get rid of the man’s wife

title: FBI searches home of Washington Post reporter in classified documents probe

title: Trump threatens to halt federal money next month not only to sanctuary cities but also their states
desc: President Donald Trump says that his administration is planning to halt federal payments to "sanctuary cities" and the states where they're located starting Feb. 1

title: Ex-CEO charged with embezzling $5.2M from camp for sick kids
desc: The former CEO of a nonprofit camp for kids with serious medical conditions has been been charged with 15 felonies after prosecutors said he embezzled more than $5 million from the camp co-founded by Paul Newman

title: Louisiana seeks California doctor’s extradition, testing the limits of shield laws
desc: Louisiana is pushing to extradite a California doctor accused of mailing abortion pills, challenging laws that protect telehealth providers shipping these pills nationwide
